content: How do you have a listing that says "order in the next 5 HOURS and get this tomorrow morning" and then 5 MINUTES later when you go to place the order, that's no longer an option. Honestly, it's getting old. This happens CONSTANTLY and it's getting really old. Other than that, most of the time things are delivered on time. Occasionally there are late items. The drivers consistently ignore delivery instructions, not necessarily an Amazon app issue though. Definitely needs work all around.

I've been frustrated for quite some time with this app but never left a review. The new update has fixed half of my frustration, as before my account page and menu would take forever to load if it loaded at all. Now they are quick to pull up and I am so happy for that change, hence the 3 stars. However, for ages now I can not pull up the pictures to see them full screen or watch any videos on the listings, it just sits and spins. I'm happy you fixed the loading issues but please fix this, too!

Not so much a problem with the app but a problem with Amazon. Orders are not arriving. Some orders are returned without ever arriving and others just seem to disappear before being delivered. I'm in a remote area where shopping options are limited. Amazon used to be a reliable option. Search function is terrible, it just repeats the same items. It definitely needs better filter options. I'd like to be able to filter by country of origin for one thing.

N'ver mind, I'll just walk the 20 miles to the nearest Amazon warehouse. Like others said, the app has become SO slow and it's crashing just about every time I'm on. I've cleaned the junk from my phone without changes. I just noticed a new issue yesterday. Sometimes when I want to go back a page it brings me to the home page. I love Amazon and rely on it for items I can't find anywhere else, like a certain type of syringe needed for my son's meds. Please, PLEASE address these issues. Thanks!

Update: they have removed the easily accessible chat button. So good luck getting in touch w customer service. Amazon also let's dealers use old reviews for new products. Original: If you use any of the sorting options (like "price: low to high" because you can't filter by price) it will take out thousands of options. Designed to make you waste time looking through thousands of items.

Very frustrating with anything related to returns. Not a problem with the app, it's operating exactly how it was designed. During the pandemic Amazon was a life saver! The first year I shopped extensively with good results. Then small random charges were hitting my acct monthly- never an explanation and quickly removed. Items listed as "eligible for return" were refused- period. Expensive items arrived Used (Vacuum spilled dirt/dog hair all over my floor). Many wrong/damaged items, I gave up.

While this app is very useful for shopping, it has some flaws. Frequently when I try to place an order from my shopping cart, it gives me an error and won't let me place the order, but if I select "Buy now" and don't make any changes, it'll let me place the order, and the package will be delivered to my home address. The option of having push notifications by text would help me get my package before the porch pirates do, but I don't see that being offered as an option.

Use to order so much, but this past year so many orders never arrive. It shows up as me returning the item, and most of the time the price of the item goes up from when I originally ordered it. Anytime I've turned to the Help Center on the app they say they'll fix the problem, and never do. Ordering any items to be delivered is now becoming a big gamble, if things continue to be unreliable I'm pulling my subscription and looking for a better alternative.

Love the app, it does everything you'd like it to, especially appreciate the map /update notifications to see where your package is as its approaching your house. I removed 1 star because it is a little clunky, terribly slow much of the time, especially upon first opening it up. Also the menu is not that easy to figure out. I think it may simply be the font is too small.

App is stale, no dark mode. Prime is worth it if you shop online a lot, but the service is mediocre aside from great prices and shipping, for example my account can't review products because of "suspicious activity" when the app accidentally thought I tried to review a pair of earbuds too many times but I didn't. Been like that for two years, maybe three now, can't revert it, customer service doesn't help either sadly. Also some of the controversy that comes with Amazon as a company leer me away

Edit: Terrible shopping experience. Been over a year of packages not being delivered or being over a week late. Not only me, but several of my friends and family have been dealing with this and decided to cancel all our amazon accounts including all of our primes, due to the poor customer service, not getting our packages, and deceitful advertising. It has been over a year this and it's not worth paying for a service that dosent do what they strive to do. Much easier to go to Walmart.

The app no longer gives me push notifications when my orders ship, when they are 10 stops away or when they are delivered. I no longer get notifications about lightning deals for items in my wishlists. I haven't changed any settings, confirmed that nothing is blocking notifications on my phone, even reached out to support for help, which they were no help. I even tried re-installing the app and still have issue. Amazon has gone downhill in general, no longer 2 day shipping on anything...

Newest update is worst than the last. I'm honestly pretty annoyed with this update. This update made the app way to convoluted for kindle books. I am an avid reader and can't buy books through the app anymore. I have to search for them in a web browser on Amazon. It's gate keepy and pointless, it was fine before and makes trying to buy books more difficult. I try using the links listed and those don't even work. Looks like Amazon doesn't care about its authors or readers.

Holy hell Amazon, you have a major damn flaw. Tried contacting support through the odd customer service menu. Found a small "contact us" after navigating a bunch and trying to search, but it only brings me back to the main menu. click one of the tabs like "something else", but it only asks me to sign in...Which I can't..Because you keep asking for a 2 step OTP... From my old number, which I don't have. I even changed my own password... which needed approval... From my email. Still stuck. Stupid.

Amazon is robbing people. Seriously. For 2 years they've consistently taken money from my cards on file for Prime membership well after canceling multiple times. It doesn't matter if I cancel it or an Amazon representative, and get refunded all or half in some cases. They charge me again. 16.25. I talk to them several times per month. when you make a purchase, be sure to take all your cards off the app. I use audible and kindle so I kinda have to keep returning to the app or website.

Found a hard to find book on here, so wide range of books, but account creation was IMPOSSIBLE. I created an account, tried to sign in, said email was already used. Reset password (which I set 2 minutes ago) didn't work, did it again, worked, gave me an almost impossible recaptcha, and then asked for my password again, gave me another recaptcha, asked for my password a third time, and then I signed in to a UI that looks like it came from 2011. Lots of products but terrible user interface.

Amazon needs to tighten up. My account is paused due to a billing issue, I've updated my new debit card and it's still not working properly. It saved my new info, I've even deleted all other cards, called customer service they did it would take 24hrs to update. Well it's been 36 hrs and it's still saying it's paused. Customer service online chat and on the phone were both foreign and was no help. Grrrrrr!!! I'm beyond irritated!

All of the scams of alliexpress, with none of the good pricing. Of the 10 christmas gifts I ordered this year, 2 were the actual expected products. Unable to filter searches by any reasonable parameter like by material, amazon is going to show you all products regardless. You have to sift through 3-5 page "description" of the product, they hide real specs To top it off, this app always keeps your mic on and records what you talk about with others to determine what products to push to you.

Had this app for years and it was GREAT (5 stars)! Something's happened since Jan 9th, 2023 (as far as I can tell) and the app now doesn't fully function with my account. Previous orders show only for this year and to view older orders I must now filter by year. Even then it only shows some of the orders for each of those years. Home page sometimes doesn't fully load and other functions have become unstable on my Sony Xperia 5 III running Android 13. Better experience with the website, by far!

It works great. 5 stars. I'm actually really confused and upset that the Google play terms somehow forbid kindle or prime purchases in app now. I use the app because it's lower bandwidth. I often can't load websites when I'm in 'throttled mode'. This makes it impossible for me to buy kindle books, or start/stop a prime subscription at times... yet I can still make purchases... this crippling restriction makes no sense.

I was forced to download the app to try to chat with an agent but couldn't find where to report package not received despite being delivered. Ended up having to make a phone call where my poor hearing caused a communication issue but the agent was able to get it resolved finally. Wished I could chat with an agent without being forced to download the app for something that was hidden/not easy to find.

I have NEVER been so disgusted by an app and the company it services! BEWARE: Amazon has blocked me from my account simply because I changed phone numbers--and I have over $75 in balance! Out of the blue, after trading phones in and changing numbers over the years and being allowed to use my email and password suddenly that is not enough my only option is to accept a text on a phone I no longer have. THIS IS THIEVERY!

ALWAYS SLOW! Browsing for items is an awful experience, takes long to fully load searches, especially when viewing products and it's description and reviews. It seems like the lag is caused by the excessive banner ads and recommendations, and who knows what else (collecting every bit of user data). It is causing me to avoid shipping on Amazon altogether because it is so slow. Shopping on the web browser on Amazon's website is 10x faster and loads quicker, the app is slow and always has been.

New update made it worse. Before, I could see which item has been shipped and which not, just by looking at them in my orders and now I have to click on each individual order to see the shipping status. Also, items that haven't been delivered used to be highlighted with different color and go to the top of the list. Now orders are randomly black and green for no particular reason and are listed by date you ordered them. So some processed items appear below those that have already been delivered.

"My orders" page freezes and just keeps loading everytime I try to check my previous orders. It's been like this for months, and it's just getting worse. I have to retry many many times before it starts working. It's frustrating. I see I'm not the only one who has this problem since I see others in this review section having the same problem. Please fix it.

Amazon has been delivering to my neighbors and NOT following the written directions for my deliveries. Very frustrating and difficult as I need the items to go at the top of my porch where my front door is located. I have difficulty lifting and carrying and why I order. Cannot seem to find a person to address this issue! Thankfully two wonderful drivers have followed the directions. Thanks to you two!

I don't know what's wrong with the app today, but it started wigging out my phone. It kept flashing "close app" or "report feedback" but it kept flashing so fast you can't select anything! And I tried it several different times all day today. I wanted to "uninstall" the psychotic app, and when I selected uninstall, it changed to "update". I don't want to Update! I want to uninstall this app. You can keep your stupid app. I don't know what's going on, and frankly I don't care!!

Customer service sucks. Lost or stole our package. Told we'd get a refund, never got it, then said because it had been so long (we tried multiple times and 30 days ended up passing) we were no longer in the 30 day limit and no longer had the option for a refund/replacement or to even cancel current payments on the item we never received. ü´† Wonderful.

The app is good, the full website is better. Biggest complaint is getting to your lists or orders. Both should be easily click able from the app home screen. Instead you get a bunch of promos or suggestions. And usually for a variation of something already bought. I mean, if I just bought a vacuum....why are you showing me 10 more vacuums? It's good. It just could be better.

Amazon used to be the place for quick deliveries and deals. Now they are constantly losing packages, orders take over a week to arrive, they take longer to update tracking information, and their prices are much higher for bad quity items. If it wasn't because it's included with my current phone plan I honestly would not bother to pay extra for a prime membership.

App is pretty much unusable. Constantly freezing, no support for dark mode, irrelevant search, editing profile doesn't save changes sometimes, searched phrases stay in search bar after removing them, not available to switch languages without changing a region. App design is sad, non intuitive and frustrating. Looks like someone copy-pasted it from stackoverflow site.

Update: I'm not sure if this is an issue with the app or my tablet as quite frequently I have to uninstall and reinstall the app to be able to use the comment and other "pop-up" features of the app. Force closing the app, or resetting the cache or data doesn't fix the issue; it has to be an uninstall and reinstall for it to function properly again, which is what I'm about to do (again).

i love shopping here its great. But they have so many problems with there app. 1 it lags so much. 2 they over price everything. 3 if you have too many items in your cart and you order all of them at the same time most of your items with be missing so you have to order most of them one at a time it just gets so annoying.

It is just a garbage app without any additional function that amazon webpages doesn't, it is meant to let Amazon exercise further control over what the customer sees with sponsored items listed above what is the most matching products per customer search input. I'd highly recommend just google the item you want, just adding "amazon" in the search instead and blacklist this app once and for all. This app is basically an ad-platform disguised as a shopping platform.

The app has gotten frustrating. Instead of getting search results that I actually want, I get a lot of trash. Or the app just assumes the type of product (IE: looking for cute decor to buy for Lunar New Year, I initially only got cheap ugly hits. I tried just a general "red rabbit" and got a lot of books. The app assumed I wanted books and will not allow me to expand or alter my search to decor, jewelry, etc. Aggravating.

My experience with the app and customer service via chat today was utter trash. In the final steps of completing a $170 grocery order (spent lots of time making lots of deliberate choices), all items suddenly vanished from my cart. The "best" response from customer service - after an inaccurate one and a rude, unacceptable one - was that it's a glitch. Well, yes. Obviously. And the app seems unusually glitchy right now. I spend a lot on Amazon. My time is precious. Amazon must do better.

User experience much worse Before you could quickly go to orders to see their status, now you have to click your profile, then click orders and then it just refreshes randomly... Then you have to click more, search for your product and then view the order. And not all orders have the return button, you have to go to customer service to return an item. It's like they deliberately made it harder to return items in the hope users will give up

The app doesn't have a dark mode. All the time it crashes whenever I'm trying to view live streams. The application runs incredibly poor trying to view all of my orders. It takes almost 3 to 5 seconds just to get to the page that will let me go to the orders page. That's right. There's no button to go to the orders page on the home page. First I have to load a different page to get to where I want to go. Then I have to load the orders page. The entire process would be about 20 seconds. Horrible.

The search function doesn't work any better with the app than it does with the website. It can't even prioritize brand names over generic, off-brand, no-name garbage. Refining search terms often results in the same irrelevant trash in the same order as the broader search terms, page after page, with the occasional brand name item randomly appearing. Deleted. Tired of wasting time on irrelevant listings with inflated prices and phony reviews.

The problem for me is that app is so bugged. I have made an order that'll cost ¬£50 around that mark. I have decided to pay another way on another device and decided I should just cancel the order on this phone. For some reason, I cannot cancel my order, no matter how many times I close the app and open it up again, the order can't be cancelled despite there being no payment. So now I'm thinking that because of this, as soon as I recieve funds, it'll be taken by Amazon right? because they charge.

Basic features (pressing a search option, loading review page) completely fail in landscape. Others fail entirely after an update, such as the ADD TO CART button of all things. Can't disable vibrate upon add to cart, an archaic feature by most standards. Clearly not enough time is being put into this app and it shows. 1/2023 they have made the share button not work so you have to press it twice and it asks you about "ask friends for advice"??? What is that even about???

App used to be better. There's too many clicks to get to your orders now. If I search for something, what I'm looking for doesn't show until after 3-4 things I don't need. Their pricing is getting higher on most products. I have to check manufacturers websites now for cheaper pricing. And Prime shipping isn't Prime shipping anymore. I live near 2 distribution centers and prime shipping used to be same day or next day on most things, but now I have to wait 4-7 days... they got us hooked

The app itself works fine, however the shopping experience can range from great to absolutely horrendous. On my last purchase Amazon lost my order, al9ng with many other issues and I was promised a refund as compensation, to match the price of my initial purchase. I was, however, scammed out of $300 despite several associates reassuring me the offered compensation would be honored. Overall terrible customer service.

It really sucks that the Amazon app doesn't have any of my past purchases on my home page...I've bought so many items and i have no record of them...it just tells me i haven't made any buys in the past 3 months...it's very disappointing cause I've bought countless things in the last 3 months..unfortunately a good customer isn't recognized by Amazon so the eagerness to continue shopping slows right down...please Amazon fix this issue so i can be recognized by you once again and shop again

Agonizingly slow at most times! Constant Alexa request to use is so annoying. Most annoying is the fact that the Alexa symbol is permanently affixed, I imagine strategically, so that every time you touch it by accident, it requests that you use Alexa. I do not w This is a real annoyance! I order several times a month with Fresh, it is always a painful experience. Search is extremely slow and and when you search a specific item/category, you might get a list of items including non-related items.

I got this app a month back, and has been terrible. My first order did not come, it just said payment revision needed. I revised the payment method again and again yet it changed nothing. Then all of a sudden my order was voided so I ordered again, then ANOTHER roadblock showed itself! I couldn't use the free delivery promotion for my first order. Have not received any orders for the time I have had this disappointing app.

Stupid @$$ app. It NEVER works for same day delivery after the last couple of updates in the past few months. Used to always work for qualified items. Now it cons you into ordering something more than $25 and then pulls the bait & switch and you have to select next day or later delivery, bc same day delivery it takes you in an infinite loop between "purchase now" and "continue" giving you shipping options (which same day option refuses to acknowledge for the order). Typical big tech BS

Disgraceful app Has always been slow with poor search ability but is now practically unusable. Keeps telling me the app is not responding. Click on anything like Orders and several minutes pass before any response from app. Gave up trying to process return on the app - had to call Amazon to get it done. Really puts me off shopping with Amazon.

amazon did not honor special offer of $15 off next purchase with first sign in on app. Then I spent way too much time trying to set up text alerts for delivery only to find out that you have to use a computer to do that. AND check out for orders has gotten to be such an ordeal trying to make sure you're getting free shipping, making sure they're using your gift card balance, making sure all coupons and discounts are applied, etc. Such a pain! Then there's trying to find best price for an item...

WONT LET ME GET TO THE RETURN PAGE. DIFFICULTY VIEWING ORDER PAGE. ORDER TAB IS ON CONSTANT MALFUNCTION. WONT LET ME SEE ORDERS. It's been this way for OVER HALF A YEAR NOW. Constantly glitchy malfunctioning. Whenever I can manage to get to orders, I can't view all orders and it sometimes won't show the return tab. I have kept the app updated, yet this problem persist.

Buyer-recorded vid. reviews don't show vid. on my fire tablets: Video play recenters screen on mostly blank pg, & audio starts, but visual playback is missing, w/ no way to find vid. by scrolling on screen. Search options hide shipping costs from 3rd party shippers until after an item is added to cart, and should show a shipping cost or typical ship-range: maybe cost range icons: (¬¢, $, $+{over $5}, $$ {over $10}, or $$+{over $20}). Time-waster. Sorting options need2allow 2-3 categories, not 1.

This used to be a good company, now, it's horrible. Trying to get a "approve, or deny" notification takes atleast 5 minutes of going throw your email, and don't bother trying to accept from a text message, it always goes straight to "unable to recive". Refunding anything takes a week sometimes, used to be immediately. The prices are so high now on certain things, like books, which is how Amazon started, that I now go to Ebay for most everything. Go to Sellers for best, cheap service!ü§¨

I've been locked out of 6 accounts the past two months was lucky I was was able to cancel prime on a old phone on one. Everytime I make an account Amazon locks me out of it within a week or two. This time I made 3 purchases went back on Amazon and boom I'm locked out. Support has been utterly useless and won't help at all. This order I've done tonight will definitely be my last. I've had it with having to make new accounts over and over again I'm done. I'll just use eBay from now on.

One of the worse apps ever. I tried logging into my account and encountered unnecessary verification steps. 1 was to verify the expiry date of 1 of my cards which I closed. How am I to remember the expiry date if I don't have the card anymore! And the worse part is, theres no alternative options to proceed. The suggestion was to contact Amazon Customer Service, with no helpful links or hotlines to use. Totally useless and worthless app!

Amazon is getting worse & worse in every way. We signed up for Amazon Prime when it began b/c of the 2 DAY SHIPPING, which, when it started, actually was pretty much the item shipped the next day & you got it 2 days later. Now they pretend it's 2 days from whenever they decide to ship it. Lies. Since December, everything I look to buy won't arrive for over a week, even though they built a huge warehouse here. Then everything is late or lost & not their problem! It is your problem, Amazon. FIX IT

Never will I ever shop or deal with amazon again. I try to login to my account and get some bogus message about a notification bc of "security process" it never sends the notification I call customer service to resolve the issue provide all my info and they still refuse to unlock my account bc I have to do it through that message. Their service is by far the worse I've ever experienced!!!!! Only reason they got 1 star from me is bc I had to select at least one to write this review!!

App is unbelievably slow and intermittent, constantly drops search topic and goes back to error page instructing to 'return to Amazon Home'. Also constantly have to clear App 'cache storage' multiple times during App use. List search function is difficult to use and fails or misses finding the product search topics during searches of my 'Wish List' and 'Buy Again Listings'. Scrolling in 'My Orders' now 'lazy loads' after last update when try to view pages. Only have problems with this app.

Amazon Fresh is horrible!!! It was the only reason for my Prime membership. After continously messed up or "undeliverable" orders, I decided my money would be better used at instacart. Instacart is actually able to complete orders. I'd rather pay extra on instacart for a correct order than gamble every week with your workers. You shouldn't mess with people's money or food. And every week they were doing both to me!!!

Alexa bubble - the Alexa bubble kept giving me (un) helpful hints while I was trying to go through the results of my search. I know the bubble is there, if I wanted something, I would have tapped it. Showing me once was enough. And I don't see a way of turning it off. I'll go back to the browser version, thank you.

They removed Sign Out option. I was signed in but I wanted to not be signed in and after wasting 30 minutes trying to figure it out I just deleted the app. The website works fine. The app steals info and spies on you anyway, that's probably why they don't want you signing out. Edit: 2 years later I definitely can not sign out or uninstall. I am stuck in my business account and can not switch to personal.

Everything is so much smaller than it shows, and it's so much extra money for the terrible quality. And it sucks that now, since in stores doesn't have any good room decor, I am left with two choices, either shop in Amazon and everything be so expensive for almost nothing or shop on a sketchy website and not know if I'll ever get the stuff I ordered

Terrible customer service. Can't login cause I changed my number and definitely can't get help. I've created 3 accounts with them this far I'm not doing anymore. Uninstall the app. It's worth it. *edit : just got off the phone with customer service and they can't help me either. No use having this app if I can't ever get into it.

No way to disable unwanted "suggestions" without turning off all notifications. Too much sponsored content. Terrible search. Reputable sellers and brands are leaving for other platforms, leaving behind garbage and scammers. Amazon needs to let buyers choose the shipping method, as we have completely lost access to reliable shipping times and carriers.

I have called several times with complaints receipts and even sent letters asking for refunds. They tell me to call, I do, and, they say they can't find my orders even when I provide the receipt number the order number and exact times and dates of purchases. Also, there are adds in the App. There is an option to clear the below and (or) edit your reciew.review. Also please note that this was edited *

It's good for shopping but useless once you have parcel miss-placed/missing/lost in tracking. Contacting Amazon is hidden in menus and you get bot to respond same answers that are in FAQ and T&C. No point to hold Amazon "spyware" in your phone than desktop is easier to orient around and does little sniffing (cookies) in your device.

It takes over a week for parcels to even get in the mail, even in the off season. They will occasionally say you are getting free shipping at checkout and arbitrarily split your order and charge shipping for both. I've gotten the completely wrong item twice in the past year. Maybe 1 in 4 items from the fulfillment centers comes new and unopened. Once you drive all your competitors out of business and I guess you're free to stop giving a damn.

APP Recently started chewing through data allowance. 1.5Gb in a couple of weeks is wild and that is with background data turned off. Suspect the high data usage is why others complain of it being slow. This is a recent problem, not one that has always been there. Have minimised my use of the app as I do not intend to increase my data allowance.

Never really used Amazon just Ebay but in my experience there customer service isn't as good as it used to , so saying that I started using Amazon and really happy with the speed of delivery, and having used there customer service's on two occasions and on both time's was delt quickly, yes price and quality is important but so is customer service, so on my experience over several months I give Amazon 6 stars. Keep it up Amazon. D Cross

Always fast shipping BUT... Seriously Amazon .CSV Files when I ask for order history.. Please fix.. My computers, laptops only reconize this as notepad.. I need a actual proper pdf copy.. phones and tablet say cannot open.. And this is when I can get any of my devices to try for the download.. I'm shouting at my electronics because of your file choice.. Hmm-mm-mmm Seriously please change to at least a .PDF format.. That is the reason for the 3 stars

Horrible experience this past couple of months. I've used their ordering service for years with some hiccups, but never issues like this. The last 3 packages I've order say they are delivered yet I have never received them. And their customer support just runs you through circles without providing any true help other than "online store credit for new products". If this is the way you guys will operate going forward I can't use the service anymore and will cancel my prime membership

Order is canceled without any reason: it was the first time I placed an order on amazon fresh this morning. And I've waited hours for delivery. I can also see the process in the app that is almost arriving. But it was cancelled automatically without any reason! It wasted me a whole morning. I'm so frustrated.

The worst feature is the search function, it will match the most irrelevant items against your search terms, all in the name showing you the most matches possible. But why show 20k matches if most are irrelevant. It does not support search phrases (with double quotes) or plus or minus operators to force inclusion or exclusion, hence targeted searches are impossible.

Dont go for Amazon Prime membership. There is no benefit in it. Everything they tell you has hidden conditions and restrictions. You will end up paying a monthly fee with no benefit at all. The other apps associated with Amazon prime membership are also not telling the truth. Deliveroo says free delivery for Prime members but when you order something they refuse to deliver it free because your order is not big enough. Very disappointed to see how they are deceiving customers just for monthly fee

Im always bombarded with countless lists based on one thing i happened to look at - not buy or flag in any way - with no true customization. Im also disappointed that i cant find specific items without sifting through a hundred of other listings only connected by the run-on sentence that is the items "name".

New Layout is Terrible. The constant recommendations in the 'Deals' section is extremely annoying. It recommends completely irrelevant & inappropriate items, even after making as them so several times over. The algorithms clearly do not work. Please remove this Amazon, it makes me want to not only remove the app but close my account.

I am absolutely livid. Bought a wireless controller that was defective. Bought a wireless car charger that was also defective. Bought a "fast" car charger that was supposed to charge my defective wireless charger and guess what THAT WAS DEFECTIVE. I'm returning my things, because i want my money back. I'm never buying tech things from Amazon ever again. Much rather buy something that actually works at Walmart.

Amazon has always had the best customer experience but things are changing. I ordered an item 40 days ago and it was shipped by ups. tracking info says item could be lost, when I first contacted amazon they said they'll refund me and still deliver the item as a token of apology. I followed up the second time they said they'll only refund me. third time they say they have to wait for the carrier to return the item. Fourth time I was asked to contact the carrier and that's how I lost my money

Quite obvious that Amazon outsourced their dev team, because this is one of the worst non-performant, buggy, laggy, horrid pieces of trash I've ever had on my phone. It's clear Amazon is just poor quality all around lately. Time to move onto to other competitors. Sketchy international companies selling low quality products and now app development being equally as sketchy. Done.

*Update* Just updated the app and it's even worse now than before. I cannot checkout. I tap the "cart" option and the screen blanks for a minute and just goes back to the search page. How disappointing. App just continues to get worse. Amazon seems to be de-evolving.

Yo this app is glichy. I thought I might of downloaded a fake app but it has 500 mil downloads... well it keeps making my default language spanish. And as often as I go to settings to change it to English it goes right back to Spanish. After saving the new settings and everything. And although I read and speak Spanish it does the job but it's annoying none the less lol
